entry.title: YTD v4.3 Beta
entry.content:
1st Beta for YTD v4.3 is available for download HERE.

Discussion thread as always on XDA.

Changelog:

 v4.3 Beta
-----------------------------------
[x] new progress bars
[x] better light theme
[x] fixed app reload upon language or theme change
[x] send via SSH re-enabled for videos with encrypted signatures

entry.title: YTD v4.2
entry.content:
YouTube Downloader version 4.2 is available (for the moment only from this blog; I’ll update the external stores ASAP).

Changelog:

 v4.2 - May 14 2014
-----------------------------------
[x] more downloads requiring mux now get actually queued
[x] long running audio-extractions in background don't crash (may pause only) 
[x] formats list reorganized and other optimizations
[x] correct XDA thread link into About menu (thanks pandahunter)
[x] Khmer translation (as WIP)

entry.title: YTD v4.2 Beta-3
entry.content: A new Beta (number 3) for YTD v4.2 is available for download [link removed – old beta]. It features just some optimizations and bug fixes. Worth a try anyway. Stable version 4.2 is coming soon.

entry.title: YTD v4.2 Beta
entry.content:
A new Beta for YTD v4.2 is available for download [link removed – old beta].

Try it out! …And follow the development chat as always on XDA.

Changelog:

 v4.2 Beta-2
-----------------------------------
[x] more downloads requiring mux now get actually queued (thanks Ultramanoid)
[x] long running audio-extractions in background don\'t crash - may pause only
[x] correct XDA thread link into About menu (thanks pandahunter)
[x] Khmer translation (as WIP)
